Text:
Who gives a shit about the films now that George has added more fuckups.

Bring on the BONUS MATERIALS!

Besides, this is scenebalance, who are notorious for NOT seeding!

Since this is sourced from the Blu-ray, it is important to list the correct year for this film.

This is the 2011 version, NOT the 1983 version.

And scenebalance BLOWS!
